info.institution: Laboratory of Artificial Intelligence and Decision Support, and Faculty of Economics, University of Porto
info.summary:
Joao Gama works as a Professor in Laboratory of Artificial Intelligence and Decision Support, and Faculty of Economics, University of Porto, and his\her h-index is 41, g-index is 90. His\Her interests are :
 Data Stream; Data Mining; Knowledge Discovery; Machine Learning; Concept Drift;
